item.title: My First Post
item.dc:creator: Hassan Kassem
item.description:
Hello,

Welcome to my blog, here, I will share with you some tips and ideas about OpenFOAM in particular and other open source code which I use regularly. I thought many times before about creating a blog about OpenFOAM but I never had a chance. Today, there are many resources and blogs available online about OpenFOAM which were not available when I started using it six years ago.

click to read the rest of the article â€¦ (1 min remaining to read)
